channel.title: ::pickup command not working when i type it! please help

item.title: ::pickup command not working when i type it! please help
item.dc:creator: @communitycoder communitycoder
item.description:
@communitycoder wrote:

[quote=“abtekk, post:2, topic:420113”]Try typing

::pickup 001050 1

or

::pickup 01050 1[/quote]
thank you so much that worked!, but how can i change it to just ::pickup 1050 1 without adding the 0, much appreciated!

item.title: ::pickup command not working when i type it! please help
item.dc:creator: @niggerlove25 niggerlove25
item.description:
@niggerlove25 wrote:

dzeko:

the right is ­­>= 1… maybe your character right is 0?..

It doesn’t matter what player rights are, if your owner. You should be able to do all commands.

Try this.

     <blockquote>     if (command.startsWith("pickup") && playerRights >= 3 && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Put your username here")) {
                    try {
                        String[] token = command.split(" ");
                        int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(token[1]);
                        int newItemAmount = 1;

                        try {
                            newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(token[2]); // fixup of your pickup
                        } catch (Exception e) {
                            newItemAmount = 1;
                        }
                        if (newItemID <= 18000 && newItemID >= 0) {
                            addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);
                        } else {
                            sM("No such item");
                        }
                    } catch (Exception e) {
                        sM(
                                "I think you typed that wrong, e.g. ::pickup 995 1");
                    }
                }
            }	 </blockquote>

Read full topic

item.title: ::pickup command not working when i type it! please help
item.dc:creator: @communitycoder communitycoder
item.description:
@communitycoder wrote:

I recently downloaded a 317 source, and i gave myself owner rights… i logged in-game and then type the command ::pickup 1050 1 , and it doesn’t work? it’s something with command but i can’t see any error…

here’s the command.

if (command.startsWith("pickup") && (playerRights >= 1)) { try { int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7, 12)); int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(13)); 
			if (newItemID <= 30000 && newItemID >= 0)
			{
				addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);
			}
			else
			{
				sendMessage("That Item Doesn't Exist");
			}
		}
		catch (Exception e)
		{
			sendMessage("Wrong Syntax eg: ::item Id Ammount");
		}
	}</blockquote>

Read full topic
